title: Pixel Fishies
notes: Steam lists Shared/Split Screen PvP/Co-op and no user reviews yet. Play mode inferred from description.
raw_comment: Lead a school of fish to eat food, grow, and destroy. Up to 16 local players in 4 teams. Set Steam Input to "Forced off" for the game if you want to use more than 4 XInput controllers. Shared screen.
